changelog.metadescription: KoolSlideMenu is very Easy-to-Use PHP Slide Menu. Based on Semantic rendering, Advanced CSS together with natural Sliding effect, KoolSlideMenu is Super Fast in rendering, Highly Appearance-Customizable and Elegant Behaviors, all making it stand out to be Excellent Choice for your Site Navigation
changelog.metakeywords: php menu, php slidemenu, ajax menu, php ajax menu,sliding menu, vertical menu
changelog.log: - Fix client-side conflict with MooTools framework.
- Small enhancement related to css style.
- Adding target property to SlideMenuParent and SlideMenuChild.
- New client-side function: getParentId() has been added to SlideMenuParent, SlideMenuChild, SlideMenuPanel classes.
- Enhance styles and render to make KoolSlideMenu comply to XHTML1.0 strict. - Improve the rendering speed of KoolSlideMenu
- New property added: scriptFolder for manually setting the path to script folder.
- Make KoolSlideMenu work inside UpdatePanel. - Solve the style issues in Chrome.
- Enhance the render of JS library's absolute path.
- Make KoolSlideMenu work better with WAMP Server
- Enhance KoolSlideMenu to work when short_open_tags settings of PHP is disabled.
- Build slide menu from XML. - Sliding effect is provided. - Event handles are fully equiped. - SlideMenu is able to do single expand.
